definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control

sentences.english: TV host Yang Lan is one of China's biggest celebs.

sentences.english: Most people come to Toastmasters to overcome their fear of public speaking.

sentences.english: And when the anchorman was not in front of the camera, there was a good chance he was on his boat.

sentences.english: At the beginning, the toastmaster toasted three times all the guesses.

sentences.english: I didn't prepare in advance, I'm acting temporarily as host.
